sentences.sContent: I'll pass on the fried potato crisp, but take the porridge.
sentences.sContent_eng: I'll pass on the fried potato crisp, but take the porridge.
sentences.sCn: 炸土豆片我不吃了，粥还是要喝的。

remMethod.val: por(看作poor， 贫穷的)+ridge(山脊)→住在山脊上的穷人只能天天喝稀粥(porridge)

trans.tranOther: oats  that are cooked with milk or water and served hot for breakfast
